channel.title: Htmls on Jare's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Htmls on Jare's Blog

item.description: Idle Icon html, body { width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; margin: 0; padding: 0; } #playarea { width: 96%; height: auto; margin: 1em 2%; position: relative; } #canvas { width: 100%; height: auto; background: #F0F; margin: 0; } #inventory { display: block; width: 100%; margin: 0; } .invitem { padding: 2; border: black solid 1px; box-sizing: border-box; } #score { font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 3vw; color: yellow; position:absolute; top: 1vw; left: 3vw; text-shadow: 0.
